title: Pentagon Announces First Three U.S. Deaths in War With Iran
summary_full: U.S. Central Command did not say where the troops were killed but added that five others had been seriously wounded and that several had shrapnel injuries.
summary_public: U.S. Central Command did not say where the troops were killed but added that five others had been seriously wounded and that several had shrapnel injuries.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: First Three U.S. Deaths in War With Iran
